title: Elementary Science Concept Structuring Education Using Digital Concept Maps

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Training pre-service elementary teachers to systematize science subject knowledge and cultivate instructional design skills using digital concept-mapping tools

learning_goals: Students can visually structure relationships between key elementary science concepts using digital concept-mapping tools.
Learners can integrate multimedia elements (images, links) to analyze hierarchical connections between concepts.
Educators can develop concept-map-based assessment rubrics and apply them to peer feedback processes during instructional design.

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Concept Mapping Tool (e.g., Coggle, Miro Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
